title: Miro
content: Key Points of Contact Miro Internal Champion: - isaacg@simpli.fi Miro Customer Success Manager: Nick Cook - nicholas.c@miro.com Miro Account Manager: Michael Birch - michael.bi@miro.com Useful Resources Slack Integration Guide Miro.new To create a new Miro board from a URL https://academy.miro.com/ For learning Miro skills https://help.miro.com/hc/en-us For searching help docs https://community.miro.com/ For connecting with other Miro users https://community.miro.com/ideas For requesting and upvoting new features from Miro https://miro.com/changelog/ To see what has changed in Miro recently Looker Integration Guide https://docs.google.com/document/d/140UqPiygAqf_C55pzrJlwx3LqRw47EpWbLZUBUCemYo/edit Miro Troubleshooting Flowchart Miro Client Resource Chart Miro Beginners Guide Miro Essentials Course Participating in Miro Course https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5Bv8zaZRNB4&ab_channel=FacilitatorSchool Miro Live Trainings at Simplifi 5/13/22 Miro Live Training at Core 5/10/22 Miro Live Training at Advantage
